info.name: Happy April Fools' Day - 愚人节快乐
info.description: Install this style to make fun of your friend.
info.additionalInfo: Not work on firefox 57+ Tested on Firefox 43.0.2(Windows 10 x64 build 10586) Idea from : http://www.oschina.net

options.label: rotate contents counterclockwise to -30 deg
No Zuo No Die | 一定要选这个
options.value: * {    transition:All 0.4s ease-in-out;    -webkit-transition:All 0.4s ease-in-out;    -moz-transition:All 0.4s ease-in-out;    -o-transition:All 0.4s ease-in-out;}*:hover {    transform:scale(1.2);    -webkit-transform:scale(1.2);    -moz-transform:scale(1.2);    -o-transform:scale(1.2);    -ms-transform:scale(1.2);}
